Razor Claw remained still as a statue, watching the battle rage around him.=
 He opened a comm to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any available maximal=
, I'm pinned down and need some coverfire."
  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: SOULSTICE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, December 23=
, 2000 1:16 PM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


  Mobster stood still. The =
raptor would have to move sometime.

  Mobster (Horn Drill voice): He'll ha=
ve to move sometime. Who helped to build this house?

  Mobster kept his ca=
nnon aimed at Razorclaw, waiting and watching...
    ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturda=
y, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Razor =
Claw knew that there was only one way to survive a blast from a weapon of t=
hat size. he transformed to Raptor mode and used full strength on his shiel=
d. The ground around him incinerated on contact. He survived but it was sap=
ping to much of his strength. The raptor couldn't move without deactivating=
 his shield.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: SOULSTICE 
   =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
 =
     Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


      Mobster took a scratch of damage,=
 still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed his giant cannon at Razorcl=
aw and fired...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: CYBERWO=
LF4 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, December 22, 200=
0 7:01 AM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        Razor Claw stood c=
onfused for the moment, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped forward an=
d hurled his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impress me?" he asked l=
ooking up at the bot he challenged. 
          ----- Original Message -----=
 
          From: SOULSTICE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Se=
nt: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
          Subject: Re: Sorry souls=
tice


          Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in hi=
s place now.

          Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as Mobster, I c=
rush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

          Mobster switches voices.
=

          Kracken: But right now, we're Mobster...
            ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
          =
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


            Razor Claw looked up at his at=
tacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a challenge, Let's make thi=
s interesting, you knock me down, I join your alliance, I knock you down, y=
ou surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled his left ar=
m back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first."
         =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: SOULSTICE 
         =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 20=
00 12:18 PM
              Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


              Giga=
s: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, but I =
didn't want to waste anything on you. In other words, I am not intimidated.=
 I have seen battles come and go, me taking the brunt of the attack, but i =
still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know, you should join the All=
iance, it would do you a world of good.

              Gigas stayed planted=
 to his spot, not moving an inch...
                ----- Original Message =
----- 
                From: CYBERWOLF4 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
                Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
         =
       Subject: Sorry soulstice


                Sorry, it must've been mi=
xxed up in the battle. I found it.

                claw struck him, but Gi=
gas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by the energy =
ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and backflips, happy that he again came t=
hrough for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the s=
ize of the Razorclaw figure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized=
 bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

          =
      Razor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like=
 hell but Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be=
 knocked back about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at =
the attacker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best =
shot, I'd hate to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
              =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
        =
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Tuesday, December=
 19, 2000 6:13 PM
                  Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems =
fair, maybe the three should get help.


                  OOC: Hey, Gigas =
punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
                    ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
                    From: CYBERWOLF4 
                    To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:=
31 AM
                    Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe th=
e three should get help.


                    Razor Claw saw the three bot=
s leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance me=
mbers. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He cha=
sed the three until they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed t=
o robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you w=
ill be forced to, your choice."

                    He aproached the three=
 bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
  =
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                      Fro=
m: dachande 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                =
      Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
                      Subject=
: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


                      ::Eclipse/Wolveri=
tron/Ramus::
                       
                          They had hea=
rd the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflic=
t. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther=
 they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.















=

        eGroups Sponsor
